description: Source code for a FastAPI web service providing an API for repositioning subtitles in videos to avoid burnt-in text. It includes endpoints for health check and subtitle repositioning, and handles file uploads, processing, and download responses.

classes.name: UploadResponse
classes.description: Response model containing details about the processed subtitle result, including filename and optional note.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Health check endpoint returning a simple message indicating service health.

methods.name: reposition_subtitles( video: UploadFile = File(..., description="Video file for detecting burnt-in text regions"), subtitle: UploadFile = File(..., description="Subtitle file (.srt, .ass, .ssa, .vtt) to reposition"), )
methods.description: Endpoint to accept a video and subtitle file, process repositioning to avoid burnt-in text, and return the modified subtitle file.

ctags.name: filename
ctags.pattern: /^    filename: str = Field(..., description="Suggested filename for the processed subtitle downlo/

ctags.name: note
ctags.pattern: /^    note: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Additional information about processing")$/

ctags.name: reposition_subtitles
ctags.signature: ( video: UploadFile = File(..., description="Video file for detecting burnt-in text regions"), subtitle: UploadFile = File(..., description="Subtitle file (.srt, .ass, .ssa, .vtt) to reposition"), )
